channel.title: annotation on Rick Gilmore's site
channel.description: Recent content in annotation on Rick Gilmore's site

item.title: PLAY project
item.description: The Play & Learning Across a Year (PLAY) project will provide a first-ever glimpse inside the homes of almost 1,000 families across the U.S. We will collect, annotate (code), and openly share on Databrary video recordings of mothers and 12-, 18-, and 24-month-old infants engaged in natural behavior in their homes.

item.title: Datavyu.org
item.description: Datavyu.org is a free open-source tool for video and audio annotation.
